PLAIN TEXT VERSION



This GRETIL version has been adapted according to the following conventions:


ALL INSERTED LINES (= **-passages) begin with 5 blanks.
ALL EVEN pàdas in longer metres (with split lines) begin with 3 blanks.
(Consequently, EVEN pàdas in **-passages begin with 8 blanks.)




STRUCTURE OF REFERENCES (added):
HV_App.I,nn.nn  =  HV_App.I,section.line
**HV_App.I,nn.nn**nn:nn  =  HV_App.I,section.line**pass.-number:line

/ = daõóa in regular verse line (i.e., a line containing two pàdas)
$ = pàda separator in regular verse line

@ = marks uneven pàdas in split-line verses, e.g.: "  @ HV_App.I,20.664 @"
| = daõóa in even pàdas of split-line verses


||* ... *|| = prose

{ ... } = interlocutor line (usually not counted in **-passages)

______________


[h: ... :h] = header
[k: ... :k] = commentary
